com.is2t.mwt.widgets.tiny
Class Scale

java.lang.Object
  ej.mwt.Widget
      com.is2t.mwt.widgets.tiny.GenericRange
          com.is2t.mwt.widgets.tiny.Scale
All Implemented Interfaces:
IObservable, IRange, IScale, IWidget, ej.microui.Listener, ej.mwt.Renderable
public class Scale
extends GenericRange
implements IScale

A scale is a widget that hold a value between two bounds. This value can be modified by selecting a cursor and moving it.

Constructor Summary
Scale(int minValue, int maxValue)
          Creates a new scale specifying its bounds.
A scale is enabled by default.
Equivalent to Scale(int, int, int) passing 0 as style.

A scale is enabled by default.
